This is a Kotlin based repository with an Android Application.
It is primarily a reminder application, but it has the Notes. All data can be backed up to the users cloud.
Please follow these guidelines when contributing:

When writing functions, always:
- Add descriptive KDoc comments
- Include input validation
- Use early returns for error conditions
- Add meaningful variable names

When creating the md files for the app, always:
- Use proper markdown syntax
- Include headings and subheadings
- Use bullet points or numbered lists for clarity
- Add links to relevant sections or external resources
- Put file in the root project directory > research directory

When working on the Android UI, always:
- Follow Material3 Expressive guidelines
- Ensure responsiveness across different screen sizes
- Break Jetpack Compose functions into smaller, reusable components
- Consider different screen orientations
- Use ViewModels for state management
